news_header: A minute of silence was held in Sweden for the victims of a school shooting, where 11 people died, including the shooter.
news_original_title: Kaksi Örebron kouluampumisessa haavoittunutta edelleen tehohoidossa
news_text: On Tuesday, Sweden observed a minute of silence to honor the victims of a recent school shooting in Örebro, where 11 people, including the shooter, lost their lives. Two women and two men remain hospitalized with gunshot wounds, while the police are still investigating the incident.
